00038   void
00039   RemoteUVarImpl::initialize(UVar* owner)
00040   {
00041     owner_ = owner;
00042     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00043     client_ = ctx->client_;
00044     std::string name = owner_->get_name();
00045     ctx->varmap()[name].push_back(owner_);
00046     URBI_SEND_PIPED_COMMAND_C((*client_), "if (!isdef(" << name << ")) var "
00047                             << name);
00048     URBI_SEND_PIPED_COMMAND_C
00049           ((*client_),
00050            libport::format("external var %s from dummy",
00051                            owner_->get_name()));
00052     ctx->dataSent = true;
00053   }

00075   void
00076   RemoteUVarImpl::setProp(UProperty p, const UValue& v)
00077   {
00078     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00079     URBI_SEND_PIPED_COMMAND_C((*client_), owner_->get_name() << "->"
00080                               << urbi::name(p) << " = " << v);
00081     ctx->dataSent = true;
00082   }

00090   UValue
00091   RemoteUVarImpl::getProp(UProperty p)
00092   {
00093     UMessage* m = client_->syncGet("%s->%s", owner_->get_name().c_str(),
00094                                   urbi::name(p));
00095     aver(m->value);
00096     UValue res = *m->value;
00097     delete m;
00098     return res;
00099   }

00111   void
00112   RemoteUVarImpl::clean()
00113   {
00114     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = dynamic_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00115     ctx->varmap().clean(*owner_);
00116   }

00118   static
00119   std::string
00120   rtp_id()
00121   {
00122     // Compute once in some thread implementations, each thread has different
00123     // PID.
00124     static std::string res =
00125       libport::format("URTP_%s_%s", getFilteredHostname(),
00126 #ifdef __UCLIBC__
00127    "default"
00128 #else
00129    getpid()
00130 #endif
00131     );
00132     return res;
00133   }
00134 
00135   std::string
00136   RemoteUContextImpl::makeRTPLink(const std::string& key)
00137   {
00138     /* Setup RTP mode
00139     * We create two instances of the URTP UObject: one local to this
00140     * remote, and one plugged in the engine, and connect them together.
00141     */
00142     // Spawn a new local RTP instance
00143     std::string localRTP = rtp_id();
00144     RemoteUContextImpl::objects_type::iterator oi = objects.find(localRTP);
00145     if (oi == objects.end())
00146       return "";
00147     baseURBIStarter* bsa = oi->second->cloner;
00148     std::string linkName = localRTP + "_" + key;
00149     GD_SINFO_TRACE("Instanciating local RTP " << linkName);
00150     linkName[linkName.find_first_of(".")] = '_';
00151     bsa->instanciate(this, linkName);
00152     // Call init
00153     localCall(linkName, "init");
00154 
00155     // Spawn a remote RTP instance and bind it.
00156     // Also destroy it when this remote disconnects
00157     std::string rLinkName = linkName + "_l";
00158     *client_
00159       << "var " << rLinkName <<" = URTP.new|\n"
00160       << rLinkName << ".sourceContext = lobby.uid|\n"
00161       << "disown({var t = Tag.new | t:at(Lobby.onDisconnect?(lobby))\n"
00162       << "{\n"
00163       << "  wall(\" destroying lRTP...\")|\n"
00164       << "  try { " << rLinkName << ".destroy} catch {}|\n"
00165       << "  t.stop\n"
00166       << "}})|;\n";
00167     GD_SINFO_TRACE("fetching engine listen port...");
00168     UMessage* mport =
00169     client_->syncGet(rLinkName +".listen(\"0.0.0.0\", \"0\");");
00170     if (!mport || mport->type != MESSAGE_DATA
00171         || mport->value->type != DATA_DOUBLE)
00172     {
00173       GD_SWARN("Failed to get remote RTP port, disabling RTP");
00174       enableRTP = false;
00175       return "";
00176     }
00177     int port = int(mport->value->val);
00178     delete mport;
00179     GD_SINFO_TRACE("...ok: " << port);
00180     // Invoke the connect method on our RTP instance. Having a reference
00181     // to URTP symbols would be painful, so pass through our
00182     // UGenericCallback mechanism.
00183     localCall(linkName, "connect", client_->getRemoteHost(), port);
00184     UObject* ob = getUObject(linkName);
00185     rtpLinks[key]  = ob;
00186     // Monitor this RTP link.
00187     (*client_) << "detach('external'.monitorRTP(" << linkName << ","
00188                << rLinkName << ", closure() {'external'.failRTP}))|"
00189                << std::endl;
00190     return linkName;
00191   }
00192 
00193   void
00194   RemoteUVarImpl::set(const UValue& v)
00195   {
00196     std::string fullname = owner_->get_name();
00197     size_t pos = fullname.rfind(".");
00198     assert(pos != std::string::npos);
00199     std::string owner = fullname.substr(0, pos);
00200     std::string name = fullname.substr(pos + 1);
00201     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00202     libport::utime_t time = libport::utime();
00203     bool rtp = false;
00204     if (v.type == DATA_BINARY)
00205     {
00206       std::string localRTP = rtp_id();
00207       if (ctx->enableRTP && getUObject(localRTP)
00208           && owner_->get_rtp() != UVar::RTP_NO)
00209       {
00210         GD_SINFO_TRACE("Trying RTP mode using " << localRTP);
00211         RemoteUContextImpl::RTPLinks::iterator i
00212           = ctx->rtpLinks.find(owner_->get_name());
00213         if (i == ctx->rtpLinks.end())
00214         {
00215           std::string linkName = ctx->makeRTPLink(owner_->get_name());
00216           if (linkName.empty())
00217             goto rtpfail;
00218 
00219           std::string rLinkName = linkName + "_l";
00220           (*ctx->client_)
00221            << rLinkName << ".receiveVar(\"" << owner_->get_name()
00222            <<"\")|";
00223           i = ctx->rtpLinks.find(owner_->get_name());
00224         }
00225         ctx->localCall(i->second->__name, "send", v);
00226         rtp = true;
00227       }
00228     rtpfail:
00229       if (!rtp)
00230       {
00231         client_->startPack();
00232         (*client_) << owner << ".getSlot(\"" << libport::escape(name) << "\").update_timed(";
00233         UBinary& b = *(v.binary);
00234         client_->sendBinary(b.common.data, b.common.size,
00235                             b.getMessage());
00236         *client_ << ", " << time << ")|";
00237         client_->endPack();
00238       }
00239     }
00240     else
00241     {
00242       if (ctx->enableRTP && owner_->get_rtp())
00243       {
00244         RemoteUContextImpl::RTPLinks::iterator i
00245           = ctx->rtpLinks.find("_shared_");
00246         if (i == ctx->rtpLinks.end())
00247         {
00248           std::string linkName = ctx->makeRTPLink("_shared_");
00249           if (linkName.empty())
00250             goto rtpfail2;
00251           i = ctx->rtpLinks.find("_shared_");
00252         }
00253         ctx->localCall(i->second->__name, "sendGrouped",
00254                          owner_->get_name(), v);
00255         rtp = true;
00256       }
00257     rtpfail2:
00258       if (!rtp)
00259       {
00260         client_->startPack();
00261         (*client_) << owner << ".getSlot(\"" << libport::escape(name) << "\").update_timed(";
00262         if (v.type == DATA_STRING)
00263           (*client_) << "\"" << libport::escape(*v.stringValue, '"') << "\"";
00264         else
00265           *client_ << v ;
00266         *client_ << ", " << time << ")|";
00267         client_->endPack();
00268       }
00269     }
00270     // Loopback notification
00271     ctx->assignMessage(owner_->get_name(), v, time);
00272     if (!rtp)
00273     {
00274       if (client_->isCallbackThread() && ctx->dispatchDepth)
00275         ctx->dataSent = true;
00276       else // we were not called by dispatch: send the terminating ';' ourselve.
00277         URBI_SEND_COMMAND_C((*client_), "");
00278     }
00279   }

00300   void
00301   RemoteUVarImpl::request()
00302   {
00303     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00304     std::string name = owner_->get_name();
00305     //build a getvalue message  that will be parsed and returned by the server
00306     URBI_SEND_PIPED_COMMAND_C((*client_), externalModuleTag << "<<"
00307                             <<'[' << UEM_ASSIGNVALUE << ","
00308                             << '"' << name << '"' << ',' << name << ']');
00309     ctx->dataSent = true;
00310   }
00311 
00312   void
00313   RemoteUVarImpl::sync()
00314   {
00315     std::string tag(client_->fresh());
00316     std::string repeatChannel;
00317     if (client_->kernelMajor() < 2)
00318       repeatChannel = tag + " << ";
00319     static boost::format
00320       fmt("{\n"
00321           "  if (isdef (%s) && !(%s))\n"
00322           "  {\n"
00323           "    %s %s\n"
00324           "  }\n"
00325           "  else\n"
00326           "  {\n"
00327           "     %s 1/0\n"
00328           "  }\n"
00329           "};\n");
00330     std::string name = owner_->get_name();
00331     std::string cmd = str(fmt
00332                           % name
00333                           % compatibility::isvoid(name.c_str(),
00334                                                   client_->kernelMajor())
00335                           % repeatChannel
00336                           % name
00337                           % repeatChannel);
00338     UMessage* m = client_->syncGetTag("%s", tag.c_str(), 0, cmd.c_str());
00339     if (m->type == MESSAGE_DATA)
00340       value_ = *m->value;
00341   }

00356   void RemoteUVarImpl::unnotify()
00357   {
00358     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00359     std::string name = owner_->get_name();
00360     size_t p = name.find_first_of(".");
00361     if (p == name.npos)
00362       throw std::runtime_error("Invalid argument to unnotify: "+name);
00363     // Each UVar creation and each notifychange causes an 'external var'
00364     // message, so when the UVar dies, creation count is callbacks.size +1
00365     send(libport::format(
00366                          "UObject.unnotify(\"%s\", \"%s\", %s)|",
00367                          name.substr(0, p), name.substr(p+1, name.npos),
00368                          callbacks_.size()+1));
00369     foreach(RemoteUGenericCallbackImpl* c, callbacks_)
00370     {
00371       UTable& t =
00372       dynamic_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(c->owner_->ctx_)
00373         ->tableByName(c->owner_->type);
00374       UTable::callbacks_type& ct = t[c->owner_->name];
00375       UTable::callbacks_type::iterator i =
00376         std::find(ct.begin(), ct.end(), c->owner_);
00377       if (i != ct.end())
00378         ct.erase(i);
00379       owner_->ctx_->addCleanup(c->owner_);
00380       owner_->ctx_->addCleanup(c);
00381     }
00382     callbacks_.clear();
00383     ctx->dataSent = true;
00384     if (std::list<UVar*> *us = ctx->varmap().find0(name))
00385       us->remove(owner_);
00386   };
00387   void RemoteUVarImpl::useRTP(bool enable)
00388   {
00389     RemoteUContextImpl* ctx = static_cast<RemoteUContextImpl*>(owner_->ctx_);
00390     std::string name = owner_->get_name();
00391     size_t p = name.find_first_of(".");
00392     if (p == name.npos)
00393       throw std::runtime_error("Invalid argument to useRTP: "+name);
00394     send(name.substr(0, p) + ".getSlot(\"" + name.substr(p+1, name.npos)
00395          + "\").rtp = " + (enable?"true;":"false;"));
00396     ctx->dataSent = true;
00397   }
00398   }
